Rule Detail: FAIN is required for non-aggregate records (i.e., when RecordType = 2).
The combination of FAIN, AwardModificationAmendmentNumber, URI, and AwardingSubTierAgencyCode must be unique within the submission file.

The combination of FAIN, AwardModificationAmendmentNumber, URI, and AwardingSubTierAgencyCode must be unique when compared to currently published data--unless the record is a correction or deletion (i.e., if CorrectionLateDeleteIndicator = C or D). In this particular case, the combination of these four fields in this transaction has already been published in USAspending, making this second attempt a duplicate.
ActionType is required for non-aggregate records (i.e., when RecordType = 2).
ActionType must contain one of the following values: "A", "B", "C", "D", or blank.
ActionDate must follow YYYYMMDD format, where YYYY is the year, MM the month and DD the day.
Value of ActionDate must be between 19991001 and 20991231 (i.e., a date between 10/01/1999 and 12/31/2099).
A future ActionDate is valid only if it occurs within the current fiscal year
AssistanceType field must contain one of the following values: "02", "03", "04", "05", "06", "07", "08", "09", "10", or "11".
RecordType field must contain one of the following values: "1" or "2".
URI is a required field for aggregate records (i.e., when RecordType = 1)
FiscalYearAndQuarterCorrection is an optional field, but when provided must follow YYYYQ format, where YYYY is a year and Q represents fiscal quarter and takes value 1, 2, 3, or 4.
Year provided in FiscalYearQuarterCorrection must be in current or directly previous fiscal year (as compared to the date of submission).
AwardeeOrRecipientLegalEntityName must contain "MULTIPLE RECIPIENTS" for aggregate records (i.e., when RecordType = 1).
LegalEntityAddressLine1 is required for non-aggregate records (i.e., when RecordType = 2)
LegalEntityAddressLine1 must be blank for aggregate records (i.e., when RecordType = 1)
LegalEntityAddressLine2 is optional, but must be blank for aggregate records (i.e., when RecordType = 1)
LegalEntityAddressLine3 is optional, but must be blank for aggregate records (i.e., when RecordType = 1)
LegalEntityZIP5 must be blank for aggregate records (i.e., when RecordType = 1)
LegalEntityZIP5 must be blank for foreign recipients (i.e., when LegalEntityCountryCode is not USA)
LegalEntityZIP5 is required for domestic recipients (i.e., when LegalEntityCountryCode = USA) for non-aggregate records (i.e., when RecordType = 2)
LegalEntityZIPLast4 must be blank for aggregate records (i.e., when RecordType = 1)
LegalEntityZIPLast4 must be blank for foreign recipients (i.e., when LegalEntityCountryCode is not USA)

When it exists, LegalEntityZIPLast4 should be provided for domestic recipients (i.e., when LegalEntityCountryCode = USA) for non-aggregate records (i.e., when RecordType = 2). A warning will be triggered when it is not provided.
LegalEntityForeignCityName is required for foreign recipients (i.e., when LegalEntityCountryCode is not USA)
LegalEntityForeignCityName must be blank for domestic recipients (i.e., when LegalEntityCountryCode = USA)
LegalEntityForeignProvinceName must be blank for domestic recipients (i.e., when LegalEntityCountryCode = USA)
LegalEntityForeignPostalCode must be blank for domestic recipients (i.e., when LegalEntityCountryCode = USA)
BusinessTypes must be one to three letters in length. BusinessTypes values must be non-repeated letters from A to X.
LegalEntityCountryCode Field must contain a valid three character GENC Standard Edition 3.0 (Update 4) country code.
FundingAgencyCode is an optional field, but when provided must be a valid 3-digit CGAC.
FundingSubTierAgencyCode is an optional field, but when provided must be a valid 4-digit sub-tier agency code.
When provided, CorrectionLateDeleteIndicator must contain one of the following values: "C", "D", or "L".
AwardingSubTierAgencyCode must be a valid 4-digit sub-tier agency code.
PrimaryPlaceOfPerformanceCountryCode must contain a valid three character GENC Standard Edition 3.0 (Update 4) country code.
AwardDescription is required for non-aggregate records (i.e., when RecordType = 2).
FederalActionObligation must be blank or 0 for loans (i.e., when AssistanceType = 07 or 08).
FederalActionObligation is required for non-loans (i.e., when AssistanceType is not 07 or 08).
NonFederalFundingAmount must be blank or 0 or for loans (i.e., when AssistanceType = 07 or 08).
FaceValueOfDirectLoanOrLoanGuarantee is required for loans (i.e., when AssistanceType = 07 or 08).
FaceValueOfDirectLoanOrLoanGuarantee must be blank or 0 for non-loans (i.e., when AssistanceType is not 07 or 08).
OriginalLoanSubsidyCost is required for loans (i.e., when AssistanceType = 07 or 08).
OriginalLoanSubsidyCost must be blank or 0 for non-loans (i.e., when AssistanceType is not 07 or 08).
BusinessFundsIndicator must contain one of the following values: "REC" or "NON".
AwardeeOrRecipientUniqueIdentifier Field must be blank for aggregate records (RecordType=1) and individual recipients (BusinessTypes includes 'P').

AwardeeOrRecipientUniqueIdentifier is required for AssistanceType of 02, 03, 04, or 05 whose ActionDate after October 1, 2010, unless the record is an aggregate record (RecordType=1) or individual recipient (BusinessTypes includes 'P').
When AwardeeOrRecipientUniqueIdentifier is provided, it must be nine digits.

For AssistanceType of 02, 03, 04, or 05 whose ActionDate is after October 1, 2010, AwardeeOrRecipientUniqueIdentifier must be registered (not necessarily active) in SAM, unless the record is an aggregate record (RecordType=1) or individual recipient (BusinessTypes includes 'P').

For AssistanceType of 02, 03, 04, or 05 whose ActionDate is after October 1, 2010 and ActionType = A, AwardeeOrRecipientUniqueIdentifier must be active as of the ActionDate, unless the record is an aggregate record (RecordType=1) or individual recipient (BusinessTypes includes 'P'). This is an error because CorrectionLateDeleteIndicator is not C or the action date is after January 1, 2017.

For AssistanceType of 02, 03, 04, or 05 whose ActionDate is after October 1, 2010 and ActionType = A, AwardeeOrRecipientUniqueIdentifier should be active as of the ActionDate, unless the record is an aggregate record (RecordType=1) or individual recipient (BusinessTypes includes 'P'). This is a warning because CorrectionLateDeleteIndicator is C and the action date is before January 1, 2017.

For AssistanceType of 02, 03, 04, or 05 whose ActionDate is after October 1, 2010 and ActionType = B, C, or D, AwardeeOrRecipientUniqueIdentifier should be active on the ActionDate, unless the record is an aggregate record (RecordType=1) or individual recipient (BusinessTypes includes 'P').
PeriodOfPerformanceStartDate is an optional field, but when provided, must follow YYYYMMDD format, where YYYY is the year, MM the month and DD the day.
When provided, PeriodOfPerformanceStartDate must be a valid date between 19991001 and 20991231.
PeriodOfPerformanceCurrentEndDate is an optional field, but when provided, must follow YYYYMMDD format, where YYYY is the year, MM the month and DD the day.
When provided, PeriodOfPerformanceCurrentEndDate must be a valid date between 19991001 and 20991231.
When both are provided, PeriodOfPerformanceStartDate must occur on or before PeriodOfPerformanceCurrentEndDate.
While they are optional fields, if either PeriodOfPerformanceCurrentEndDate or PeriodOfPerformanceStartDate is provided, both fields should be provided.
When provided, LegalEntityZIPLast4 must be in the #### format.
LegalEntityZIP5 must be a valid 5-digit USPS ZIP code.
The combination of LegalEntityZIP5 and LegalEntityZIPLast4 should be a valid 9-digit USPS ZIP+4 code.
CFDA_Number must be in XX.XXX format, where # represents a number from 0 to 9.

For all records, CFDA_Number must have been registered with CFDA.gov at some point in time. For new assistance awards (ActionType = A) specifically, the CFDA_Number must be active as of the ActionDate. This does not apply to correction records (those with CorrectionLateDeleteIndicator = C).

For non-new assistance awards (ActionType = B, C, or D), the CFDA_Number need not be active as of the ActionDate, but a warning will trigger in this case. This warning will not trigger for correction records (those with CorrectionLateDeleteIndicator = C).
FundingOfficeCode must be six characters long.
AwardingOfficeCode must be six characters long.
PrimaryPlaceOfPerformanceCode must be 00*****, 00FORGN, or start with a valid 2-character state code.
PrimaryPlaceOfPerformanceCode must be 00FORGN when PrimaryPlaceofPerformanceCountryCode is not USA, and must not be 00FORGN otherwise.
PrimaryPlaceofPerformanceZIP+4 must not be provided for any format of PrimaryPlaceOfPerformanceCode other than XX#####.
PrimaryPlaceOfPerformanceCode must have a valid county code as the last 3 characters when reported in countywide format.
PrimaryPlaceOfPerformanceCode must be in countywide format (XX**###) for aggregate records (i.e., when RecordType = 1).
For PrimaryPlaceOfPerformanceCode XX#####, city code ##### must be valid and exist in the provided state when PrimaryPlaceOfPerformanceZIP+4 is not provided.
City codes must exist in the state indicated by the PrimaryPlaceOfPerformanceCode. If a valid PrimaryPlaceOfPerformanceZIP+4 is provided, this will only trigger a warning.
The provided PrimaryPlaceofPerformanceZIP+4 must be in the state specified by PrimaryPlaceOfPerformanceCode.
When provided, PrimaryPlaceofPerformanceZIP+4 must be in the format #####, #########, #####-####, or contain 'city-wide'.
The provided PrimaryPlaceofPerformanceZIP+4 must be in the state specified by PrimaryPlaceOfPerformanceCode.
If PrimaryPlaceOfPerformanceCode is XX00000, PrimaryPlaceOfPerformanceZip+4 must not be 'city-wide'.
PrimaryPlaceOfPerformanceForeignLocationDescription is required for foreign places of performance (i.e., when PrimaryPlaceOfPerformanceCountryCode does not equal USA).
PrimaryPlaceOfPerformanceForeignLocationDescription must be blank for domestic recipients (i.e., when PrimaryPlaceOfPerformanceCountryCode = USA).
When PrimaryPlaceOfPerformanceCountryCode is not USA, PrimaryPlaceOfPerformanceCongressionalDistrict must be blank.
If PrimaryPlaceOfPerformanceZIP+4 is 5-digits or blank, a PrimaryPlaceOfPerformanceCongressionalDistrict must be provided.
If PrimaryPlaceOfPerformanceCongressionalDistrict is provided, it must be valid in the state or territory indicated by the PrimaryPlaceOfPerformanceCode.
